subject: User email address enumeration vulnerability on LIDL Plus app
bodyHtml: Hello, During our research on user account enumeration flaws on Estonian online services, we found that your mobile app is vulnerable to the exposure of registered user email addresses. The vulnerability report is attached. We would appreciate it if you could confirm receipt of this email to prevent us from reaching out to you through other channels. Best regards, Gregor Eesmaa Computer Science MSc student University of Tartu, Institute of Computer Science
